subject: Re: [junit] Where to write  the  test
msgSnippet: ... Whenever I have no idea where to start, I just visit Google and start typing words in. I recommend using keywords like JUnit guide or JUnit tutorial .
messageBody:
gadesudhirreddy wrote:
>
>
> Hello friends,
>
> Iam new to unit testing,
> where to write the unit testing code.
> please help me

Whenever I have no idea where to start, I just visit Google and start
typing words in. I recommend using keywords like "JUnit guide" or "JUnit
tutorial". They will help you get started.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
